title: Shorts: Greg Judy on mob grazing tips and cow pats
subtitle: Shorts: Greg Judy on mob grazing tips and cow pats
summary: Greg Judy is an enthusiastic mob grazer based in Missouri. He talks to us about getting animals back on the land and building biodiversity in grasslands, including the importance of cow pats... all with the goal of increasing the long-term viability of your farm. We spoke to Greg at the Groundswell Show 2018.
